com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.rmi

Interface IRmiApplication

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RmiApplication

    public interface IRmiApplication
extends Remote
    The Catalys Server application is represented by a remote object with this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IRemoteMessageFactory getMessageFactory()
      Retrieve the message factory.
      ISession getSession(String externalCompID, String externalSubID, String externalLocationID, String ourCompID, String ourSubID, String ourLocationID)
      Returns a session for the FIX connection point identified by the given FIX CompID, SubID and LocationID's (see FIX specification for a description of Sender and Target id's).
      ISession[] getSessions()
      Returns all sessions which are configured with RMI adapters.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageFactory

        IRemoteMessageFactory getMessageFactory()
                                 throws RemoteException
        Retrieve the message factory.
        Returns:
        Message factory.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - if a communication-related problem occurs

      • getSession

        ISession getSession(String externalCompID,
                    String externalSubID,
                    String externalLocationID,
                    String ourCompID,
                    String ourSubID,
                    String ourLocationID)
             throws RemoteException
        Returns a session for the FIX connection point identified by the given FIX CompID, SubID and LocationID's (see FIX specification for a description of Sender and Target id's).

        If the Catalys Server has no configuration information for a party with the given ID's, null is returned.

        Parameters:
        externalCompID - CompID of party with whom we want a Session.
        externalSubID - SubID of party with whom we want a Session.
        externalLocationID - LocationID of party with whom we want a Session.
        ourCompID - CompID by which we are known to external party.
        ourSubID - SubID by which we are known to external party.
        ourLocationID - LocationID by which we are known to external party.
        Returns:
        Session for given id's. Null if no such session is known.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - if a communication-related problem occurs

      • getSessions

        ISession[] getSessions()
                throws RemoteException
        Returns all sessions which are configured with RMI adapters.
        Returns:
        Array of ISession's.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - if a communication-related problem occurs
